title: Continued Error Message on Thunderbird
content:
Hi - I keep getting the message: Login to account (my email address) failed Login to server imap.googlemail.com with username (my email address) failed.

Can you please help me fix this problem?
creator: stephanie54

title: Migrating personal folders and address books between PCs
content:
Hello, After 20+ years, I have finally begun the process of retiring my Dell Studio 1745. I have been able to set up Thunderbird on a new laptop under Windows 11 (not really happy about it but you have to do what you have to do).

I am wondering what would be the best way to move the personal folders off of the Dell and onto the new Lenovo?

I have thought about copying the Dell’s profile over to the Lenovo in a temporary area like C:\Temp and then cutting everything under the old profile over to the new one replacing all files (after backing up the new profile first of course). I’m thinking this would migrate the address books as well.

Once I have the folders and address books moved across, I will delete them from the old Dell.

Not sure if this is the best way. Any and all help/ideas/comments would be most appreciated.

Thanks and have a great day, Brocky
creator: jmbrocky

title: In Thunderbird, how do I recover my composition toolbar?  It is hidden.
content: In Thunderbird, how do I recover my menu toolbar and email composition toolbar? I have no functions to view, edit, send, save, print, an email... and all else. Thank you.

title: Printing on white (blank) sheets  Печать в белые (пустые)листы
content: не уверен это произошло с последним обновлением или нет, но thunderbird стал печатать любое вложение из почты pdf в пустой лист, не важно какой это принтер, какая ОС , какие драйвера, даже print to pdf от майкрософт в файл сохраняет пустой файл на превью сохранения и печати отображается все хорошо
creator: pavelcdn

title: Impossibile stampare pdf direttamente da anteprima
